title: Gift for an Office
headline: Replace the capsule machine. Your team will remember who made it happen.
editorial_intro: Gifting an office a proper espresso machine is the kind of gesture that shifts the entire culture of a workplace. It turns the kitchen from a place people pass through into a place people linger — and the conversations that happen while milk is steaming tend to be the ones that matter.

products.description: If the office already has a machine but is grinding stale pre-ground coffee, a dedicated grinder is the single biggest quality improvement you can make. The Macinino is forgiving enough for a shared environment where not everyone knows their dose from their yield.

The Ufficio was literally designed for this. A 2.5-litre water tank handles back-to-back drinks for morning meetings. Dual boilers mean no waiting between espresso and cappuccino. The auto-off timer and easy-descale mode keep maintenance manageable even when nobody is officially in charge of the machine.

Pair the Ufficio with a Preciso grinder and the office has a setup that rivals any neighbourhood cafe. The stepless adjustment handles the variety of beans different team members will inevitably bring in.

For offices where simplicity matters more than craft, the Automatico handles everything from grinding to frothing at the touch of a screen. Four user profiles mean the founders can save their flat white preferences while the interns figure out theirs.
Include a year's worth of cleaning tablets and descaling solution. In a shared environment, consumables disappear fast and nobody reorders them. Pre-supplying a year's worth removes this entirely.
